text: Ngoku ke uAllâh ulwenze lwalula uxanduva lwenu kuba Uyazi okokuba kukho ubuthathaka kuni. Ke ukuba ngaba kukho abalikhulu abanyamezelayo phakathi kwenu baya koyisa amakhulu amabini, kananjalo ukuba ngaba kukho abaliwaka abanyanisekileyo phakathi kwenu baya koyisa amawaka amabini ngemvume ka-Allâh. Kwaye uAllâh Ukunye nabo bancekelelayo
